10104261156081125 Actually, Reagan's best acting job was the 8 years in the White House. He gave the appearance of being presidential saying words written by others in a """"folksy"""" manner - all the while making deals with Iran to delay the release of the hostages; selling weapons to Iran in violation of U.S. law; stealing the proceeds of the illegal weapon sales and giving it to terrorists in Central America in violation of U.S. law; doubling the national debt with tax cuts and outrageous military spending; destroying the middle-class with """"trickle down"""" economics; nearly destroying the Savings & Loan industry with deregulation and no oversight; and fostering the """"junk bond"""" industry and it's devastation of jobs and industries with """"leveraged buyouts"""".

We know that the temps have been rigged to show a warming. They use readings atop buildings where the temp is a few degrees higher but then don't use temps from more isolated places b\c they are lower and would destroy their narrative.

I am so sick of everything being a tit for tat issue. My wife and I have had joint accounts since 1990 when we got engaged so my money is hers and hers mine YET when we go to dinner I pay the bill (with our money) when I see her in pain or overloaded it saddens me because I lover her and want to ease her burden NOT because she is week Oh no! She is more than capable of taking care of herself BUT I WANT to cater to her and make sure she knows there is nothing I wouldn't do for her. Chivalry IS NOT DEAD WITH ME! Ladies should be ladies and men should be men. I am not talking about arrogance by the man or dominant / submissive etc. but put your woman on a pedestal and treat her right guys and you will NOT find a more loyal being among all living beings than a woman who feels loved and appreciated.

Darren Adams, just thought Id share this with you. """"Since there were more Northerners than Southerners and there were more slaves in the South, it would have been physically impossible for more Northerners than Southerners to own slaves on a per capita basis in 1860.* Since slavery was also illegal in every Northern state, the only way for a person to own slaves in the North was to bring a personal servant from the South. (This happened, rather rarely, among some members of the Army.) * I do not know whether there was some statistical anomaly in the 18th century where there were more slaves owned by Northerners for a brief period, (say sea captains before transferring their """"property"""" to farmers), but I doubt it. Even when slavery was legal in the North, it was not economical (which is why Northern states began outlawing slavery much earlier than the general Abolition movement). However, even if more slaves were owned (temporarily) by Northerners, there were never more Northerners than Southerners who owned slaves. The """"typical"""" slave owner was more likely to be a farmer who owned one or two field hands than a plantaion owner with dozens, so the number of slave-owners in the South, while small, was still spread across the population, pretty well.""""
